casee sacac ass mena fea eerca

address.verbatim-address: Imm. Fahd, 17th Floor, blvd Djilly Mbaye, BP 2435, Dakar, Senegal

org-entry.content-note: aims to encourage the devt of indigenous technology and to improve the terms of access to imported technology
assists the establishment of national centres

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: African Regional Institute for Geospatial Science and Technology

address.verbatim-address: PMB 5545, Ile-Ife, Nigeria

org-entry.found-date: 1972, as Regional Centre for Training in Aerospace Surveys (RECTAS)
org-entry.content-note: provides training, research and advisory services in aerospace surveys and geoinformatics
administered by the ECA

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Arab Information and Communication Technology (ICT) Union

address.verbatim-address: Beirut, Lebanon

org-entry.content-note: aims to support the devt of Arab ICT enterprises and promote collaboration within the industry

address.verbatim-address: 24 ave Franklin Roosevelt, 1050 Brussels, Belgium

org-entry.found-date: 1948 as the world fed. of the reclamation and recycling industries
org-entry.content-note: promotes international trade in scrap iron and steel, non-ferrous metals, paper, textiles and plastics
org-entry.stats: mems: c. 950 cos and 37 affiliated nat. feds in 70 countries

org-entry-head.alt-name: College International pour la Recherche en Productique

address.verbatim-address: 9 rue Mayran, 75009 Paris, France

org-entry.found-date: 1951, as International Institution for Production Engineering Research
org-entry.content-note: promotes through scientific research the study of the mechanical processing of all solid materials
holds an annual Gen. Assembly (2024: Thessaloniki, Greece, in Aug.)
org-entry.stats: mems: some 600, incl. 180 Fellows and Hon. Fellows
org-entry.content-note: publs Annals (2 a year), CIRP Journal of Manufacturing Science and Technology

address.verbatim-address: Riyadh, Saudi Arabia

org-entry.content-note: aims to accelerate digital transformation and an inclusive digital economy
granted observer status at the UN General Assembly in Dec. 2022
org-entry.stats: mems: Bahrain, Cyprus, Djibouti, Kuwait, Morocco, Nigeria, Oman, Pakistan, Rwanda, Saudi Arabia

address.verbatim-address: 114 rue de Rhône, 1204 Geneva, Switzerland

org-entry.content-note: works to develop and publish standards and technical reports, in co-operation with the appropriate national, European and inter­national orgs, in order to facilitate and standardize the use of information processing and telecommunications systems
org-entry.stats: mems: 10 ordinary mems, 16 assoc. mems, 7 small and medium-sized enterprises, 10 small private co mems, 39 not for profit mems
org-entry.content-note: publs Ecma Standards , Ecma Memento (annually), Ecma Technical Reports

address.verbatim-address: 66 blvd de l'Impératrice, 1000 Brussels, Belgium

org-entry.found-date: 1999 by merger of International Union of Producers and Distributors of Electrical Energy (f. 1925) and European Grouping of the Electricity Industry (f. 1989)
org-entry.content-note: represents the common interests of the electricity industry at pan-European level; contributes to the competitiveness of the electricity industry, provides effective representation for the sector in public affairs, promotes the role of electricity both in the advancement of society and in helping to provide solutions to the challenges of sustainable devt
org-entry.stats: mems: 34 nat. asscns, in 32 European countries, 47 business mems
org-entry.content-note: publs Annual Report , Power Barometer , other special reports

address.verbatim-address: 2 ave de Tervueren, 1040 Etterbeck, Belgium

org-entry.content-note: aims to promote industrial collaboration between mem. countries on non-military research and devt activities
enables jt devt of technology
supports innovation and systematic use of standardization in new technology sectors
administers Eurostars prog., with the European Commission (EC), to fund and support collaborative research and innovation projects
also promotes Globalstars prog. to support projects in the international market
publ. Annual Report

address.verbatim-address: 32 ave des Ombrages, bte 20, 1200 Brussels, Belgium

org-entry.content-note: promotes the use of steel
administers awards
publs information sheets and documents, symposia reports, model codes

address.verbatim-address: c/o Institution of Chemical Engineers, Davis Bldg, 165-189 Railway Terrace, Rugby, Warwickshire, CV21 3HQ, United Kingdom

org-entry.content-note: promotes co-operation between non-profit-making scientific and technical socs, for the advancement of chemical engineering and its application in the processing industries

address.verbatim-address: 56/4 c ave des Arts, 1000 Brussels, Belgium

org-entry.content-note: encourages co-operation in research on methods of combating corrosion
publ. EFC Newsletter (2 a year)

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: European Federation of National Engineering Associations

address.verbatim-address: c/o Regus EU Commission, Schumanpl. 6, 6th Floor, 1040 Brussels, Belgium

org-entry.content-note: aims to affirm the professional identity of the engineers of Europe and to strive for the unity of the engineering profession in Europe
publs Annual Report , FEANI News

address.verbatim-address: 31 Gasthuisstraat, 1000 Brussels, Belgium

org-entry.content-note: liaises between national craft orgs and small and medium-sized enterprises in the metal industry
represents mems' interests at European level
provides for the exchange of information and ideas
mems: 12 nat. feds representing some 70,000 enterprises, 800,000 employees and 70,000 apprentices

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: European Organisation for the Exploitation of Meteorological Satellites (EUMETSAT)

address.verbatim-address: 64295 Darmstadt, Eumetsat Allee 1, Germany

org-entry.content-note: establishes, maintains and exploits European systems of operational meteorological satellites, supplying data to the national meteorological bodies of its mems and co-operating European states
projects include a second generation Meteosat programme for gathering weather data and satellite application facilities
publs Annual Report , brochures, conf. and workshop proceedings

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: European Organization for Civil Aviation Equipment (EUROCAE)

address.verbatim-address: 9-23 rue Paul Lafargue, Le Triangle Bldg, 93200 Saint-Denis, France

org-entry.content-note: studies and advises on problems related to the equipment used in aeronautics
supports the devt and implementation of international standards

address.verbatim-address: 22 rue du Quatre Septembre, 75002 Paris, France

org-entry.content-note: carries out studies on the legal, economic, technical and financial aspects of space activity
acts as an industrial adviser to the European Space Agency , in particular with regard to future space progs and industrial policy matters
org-entry.stats: mems: 44 aerospace cos in 14 European countries
org-entry.content-note: publs Eurospace Fact and Figures (annually), European Space Directory (annually)

address.verbatim-address: 30 Sharia Ramses, Cairo, Egypt

org-entry.content-note: a regional body of the World Federation of Engineering Organizations
co-operates with the Arab League, UNESCO and other regional engineering feds
organizes a Pan-Arab conf. on engineering studies every 3 years, and annual symposia and seminars
org-entry.stats: mems: engineering asscns in 15 Arab countries

org-entry-head.alt-name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

address.verbatim-address: 3 Park Ave, 17th Floor, New York, NY 10016, USA

org-entry.found-date: 1963 by the merger of the Institute of Radio Engineers (f. 1912) and the American Institute of Electrical Engineers (f. 1884)
org-entry.content-note: aims to promote collaboration between professionals working in different specialisms and to advance technological innovation

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Inter-American Association of Sanitary and Environmental Engineering
org-entry-head.alt-name: Asociación Interamericana de Ingeniería Sanitaria y Ambiental—AIDIS

address.verbatim-address: Avda Angélica 2355, 01227-200 São Paulo, SP, Brazil

org-entry.content-note: aims to generate awareness of environmental, health and sanitary problems and assist in finding solutions
38th Congress: Punta Cana, Dominican Rep., in Nov. 2022
org-entry.stats: mems: 32 countries and some 32,000 associates in 24 nat. sections
org-entry.content-note: publ. Revista AIDIS (2 a year)

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Association for Bridge and Structural Engineering (IABSE)

address.verbatim-address: ETH—Hönggerberg, 8049 Zürich, Switzerland

org-entry.content-note: aims to exchange knowledge and ad­vance the practice of structural engineering worldwide
org-entry.stats: mems: 58 National Groups, more than 3,000 individual mems in some 100 countries
org-entry.content-note: publ. Structural Engineering Inter­national (quarterly)

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Association for Hydro-Environment Engineering and Research (IAHR)

address.verbatim-address: Paseo Bajo Virgen del Puerto 3, 28005 Madrid, Spain

org-entry.content-note: promotes advancement and exchange of knowledge on hydraulic engineering
41st World Congress (2025: Singapore, in June) and symposia
org-entry.stats: mems: 119 institutes, 4,857 individuals and 55 young professional networks in 193 countries
org-entry.content-note: publs International Journal of River Basin Management (quarterly), Journal of Applied Water Engineering and Research (quarterly), Journal of Hydraulic Research (6 a year), Revista IberoAmericana de Agua , Journal of Ecohydraulics (2 a year), Journal of Hydroinformatics (6 a year), Urban Water Journal

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Association of Marine Aids to Navigation and Lighthouse Authorities

address.verbatim-address: 10 rue des Gaudines, 78100 St Germain en Laye, France

org-entry.content-note: holds technical conf. every 4 years
working groups study special problems and formulate technical recommendations, guidelines and manuals
a Diplomatic Conf., held in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia, in Feb. 2020 adopted a convention to upgrade IALA’s status to that of an intergovernmental org.
publ. Annual Report

address.verbatim-address: Suite 5, Meridian House, 62 Station Rd, Chingford, London, E4 7BA, United Kingdom

org-entry.content-note: fosters economy and efficiency in the movement of goods from origin to destination
organizes int. confs
publ. Research Papers

address.verbatim-address: 11 a Liberty St, Enmore, New South Wales 2042, Australia

org-entry.content-note: aims to encourage research in colour in all its aspects, disseminate the knowledge gained from this research and promote its application to the solution of problems in the fields of science, art and industry; holds international con­gresses and symposia
publ. Journal of the International Colour Association (online)

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Commission of Agricultural and Biosystems Engineering (CIGR)

address.verbatim-address: University of Florida, Gainesville, FL 32611, USA

org-entry.content-note: aims to stimulate devt of science and technology in agricultural engineering
encourages education, training and mobility of professionals
facilitates exchange of research
represents profession at international level
organizes a World Congress every 4 years (2022: Kyoto, Japan, in Dec.)
publ. CIGR Journal

address.verbatim-address: c/o Kun Wang, China Triumph Int. Engineering Co Ltd, 26 F Bldg Zhongqi 2000, North Zhongshan Rd, 200063 Shanghai, People’s Republic of China

org-entry.content-note: co-ordinates research in glass and allied products and exchanges information
hosts an International Congress every 3 years (26th: Berlin, Germany, in July 2022)

address.verbatim-address: Babenbergerstr. 9/9 A , 1010 Vienna, Austria

org-entry.found-date: 1900 as International Commission on Photometry, present name adopted in 1913
org-entry.content-note: provides an international forum for the exchange of information relating to the science and art of light and lighting
develops and publishes international standards and provides guidance in their application
org-entry.stats: mems: 38 nat. cttees, 17 asscns, 2 assoc. nat., 21 supportive
org-entry.content-note: publs standards, technical and congress reports

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Commission on Irrigation and Drainage (ICID)
org-entry-head.alt-name: Commission Internationale des Irrigations et du Drainage

address.verbatim-address: 48 Nyaya Marg, Chanakyapuri, New Delhi 110 021, India

org-entry.content-note: aims to enhance the worldwide supply of food and fibre by improving the productivity of irrigated and drained lands through the appropriate management of water and application of irrigation, drainage and flood management techniques

promotes the devt and application of the arts, sciences and techniques of engineering, agriculture, economics, ecological and social sciences in managing water and land resources for irrigation, drainage and flood management and for river training applications
holds triennial congresses (2026: Marseille, France, in Oct.)
publ. Irrigation and Drainage , technical books

address.verbatim-address: 61 ave Kléber, 75016 Paris, France

org-entry.content-note: serves as a forum for the exchange of knowledge and best practice with regard to the safe and efficient planning and construction of large dams
org-entry.stats: mems: National Cttees from more than 100 countries, serving some 10,000 individual mems, 17 assoc. orgs

address.verbatim-address: Aircraft Strength Research Institute, No.86, Dianzi 2nd Rd, Xi’an, People’s Republic of China

org-entry.content-note: promotes collaboration between aeronautical bodies and laboratories on questions of fatigue of aeronautical structures
organizes periodical confs (2023: Delft, Netherlands)

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Council for Research and Innovation in Building and Construction

address.verbatim-address: 110 Didsbury Rd, Suite M164, Kanata, ON K2T 0C2, Canada

org-entry.found-date: 1953 as the Conseil International du Bãtiment (International Council for Building)
org-entry.content-note: aims to facilitate co-operation in building research, studies and documentation in all aspects
World Building Congress held every 3 years (2022: Melbourne, Australia, in June)
org-entry.stats: mems: 300 governmental, academic and industrial orgs in 60 countries
org-entry.content-note: publs Annual Report , conf. proceedings and technical, best practice and other reports, 32 recognized or encouraged journals

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Council on Large Electric Systems
org-entry-head.alt-name: Conseil international des grands réseaux électriques—CIGRE

address.verbatim-address: 21 rue d'Artois, 75008 Paris, France

org-entry.content-note: aims to facilitate and promote the ex­change of technical knowledge and information in the general field of electrical generation and transmission at high voltages
holds general sessions and symposia (in alternate years)
manages 260 international working gps
publs Green Books , Newsletter , CIGRE Science & Engineering (3 a year)

address.verbatim-address: 3 rue de Varembé, POB 131, 1211 Geneva 20, Switzerland

org-entry.content-note: sets world standards for electrical and electronic engineering, used as the basis for regional and national standards, and in the preparation of specifications for international trade
incorporates some 100 expert technical cttees and sub-cttees
publs International Standards , Technical Specifications , Technical Reports

address.verbatim-address: Hofstr. 3, 2361 Laxenburg, Austria

org-entry.content-note: encourages research, devt and application of information processing in science and human activities
furthers the dissemination and exchange of information on information processing
org-entry.stats: mems: nat. socs in more than 38 countries

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Federation for the Promotion of Machine and Mechanism Science

org-entry.content-note: promotes and develops mechanism and machine science through research, theory, experimental methods, formation and practical applications
organizes regular confs, and a World Congress every 4 years (2023: Tokyo, Japan, in Nov.)
publs Mechanism and Machine Theory , Newsletter

address.verbatim-address: 4 Bagworth Dr., Longwell Green, Bristol, BS30 9DA, United Kingdom

org-entry.content-note: provides a forum for the exchange of international experience in maintenance, design and operations
holds annual conf.; awards international aviation scholarship and Whittle Safety Award annually
org-entry.stats: mems some 20 airlines and aviation authorities
org-entry.content-note: publs IFA News (quarterly), Airworthiness Matter (annually)

address.verbatim-address: Schlosspl. 12, 2361 Laxenburg, Austria

org-entry.content-note: promotes the research, the exchange of information and the application of auto­matic control and systems engineering
organizes a congress every 3 years (2023: Yokohama, Japan, in July; 2026: Busan, Rep. of Korea)

publs Annual Reviews in Control (2 a year), Automatica (monthly), Control Engineering Practice (monthly), Engineering Applications of AI (10 a year), IFAC Journal of Systems and Control , Journal of Process Control (8 a year), Mechatronics (10 year), Nonlinear Analysis: Hybrid Systems (quarterly)

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Federation of Automotive Engineering Societies
org-entry-head.alt-name: Fédération Internationale des Sociétés d'Ingénieurs des Techniques de l'Automobile—FISITA

address.verbatim-address: 29 M11 Business Link, Stansted, CM24 8GF, United Kingdom

org-entry.content-note: promotes the technical and sustainable devt of all forms of automotive transportation
maintains electronic job centre for automotive engineers
holds Con­gresses every 2 years (2023: Barcelona, Spain, in Sept.)
org-entry.stats: mems: nat. orgs in 37 countries and 56 hon. mems
org-entry.content-note: publs Annual Review , Inside Track (monthly)

address.verbatim-address: POB 311, 1215 Geneva 15, Switzerland

org-entry.content-note: encourages international co-operation and the establishment of standards for consulting engineers
organizes FIDIC Global Infrastructure Conf. (2023: Singapore, in Sept.), contract users confs
org-entry.stats: mems: 100 nat. asscns, 5 assoc. asscns, and 36 affiliated mems
org-entry.content-note: publs FIDIC's selection of contracts and agreements/Business practices information

address.verbatim-address: Hospitalløkkan 20 b , 7012 Trondheim, Norway

org-entry.content-note: aims to promote internationally standards of hospital engineering and to provide for the exchange of knowledge and experience in the areas of hospital and healthcare facility design, construction, engineering, commissioning, maintenance and estate management
publ. Health Estate (quarterly), IFHE Digest (annually), IFHE Newsletter

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Institute of Seismology and Earthquake Engineering (IISEE)

address.verbatim-address: Building Research Institute, 1 Tatehara, Tsukuba City, Ibaraki 305-0802, Japan

org-entry.content-note: supports work on seismology and earthquake engineering for the purpose of reducing earthquake damage in the world
trains seismologists and earthquake engineers from the earthquake-prone countries
undertakes surveys, research, guidance and analysis of information on earthquakes and related matters
publs Bulletin of the International Institute of Seismology and Earthquake Engineering (annually), Individual Studies (annually)

address.verbatim-address: 15 a Lungobisagno Istria, 16141 Genoa, Italy

org-entry.content-note: serves as the worldwide network for knowledge exchange of joining technologies
develops authorized education, training, qualification and certification progs
publ. Welding in the World (6 a year)

address.verbatim-address: Lajos utca 74-76, Budapest 1036, Hungary

org-entry.found-date: 1958 as a fed. of mem. orgs concerned with the advancement of measurement technology
org-entry.content-note: aims to promote the exchange of scientific and technical information in the field of measurement and instrumentation and to enhance co-operation between scientists and engineers
holds World Congress every 3 years (2024: Hamburg, Germany, in Aug.)
publs Acta IMEKO (proceedings of World Congresses), Measurement (quarterly)

address.verbatim-address: 8 chemin de Blandonnet, CP 401, 1214 Vernier, Geneva, Switzerland

org-entry.content-note: aims to achieve international agreement on industrial and commercial standards
publs ISO International Standards , ISO Management Systems Standards (6 a year), ISO Focus (11 a year), ISO Catalogue (annually, updated regularly online), ISO Annual Report

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Research Group on Wood Protection

address.verbatim-address: Drottning Kristinas väg 63 b , Stockholm, Sweden

org-entry.found-date: 1965 as Wood Preservation Group by the OECD
org-entry.content-note: consists of 5 sections
publs technical documents

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Society for Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing (ISPRS)

address.verbatim-address: c/o Institute of Photogrammetry and GeoInformation, Leibniz University, Nienburger Str. 1, 30167 Hanover, Germany

org-entry.content-note: holds Congress every 4 years (2026: Toronto, Canada), and technical symposia
org-entry.stats: mems: 91 ordinary mems (national), 12 assoc. mems, 13 regional and 59 sustaining mems
org-entry.content-note: publs ISPRS Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing (monthly), ISPRS International Journal of Geo-Information (quarterly), ISPRS Open Journal of Photogrammetry and Remote Sensing

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Society for Soil Mechanics and Geotechnical Engineering

address.verbatim-address: City University London, Northampton Sq., London, EC1V 0HB, United Kingdom

org-entry.content-note: promotes international co-operation among scientists and engineers in the field of geotechnics and its engineering applications
maintains 30 technical cttees
holds quadrennial international conf., regional confs and specialist confs
org-entry.stats: mems: 20,000 individuals, 90 nat. socs, 29 corp. mems
org-entry.content-note: publs ISSMGE Bulletin (quarterly), Lexicon of Soil Mechanics Terms (in 8 languages)

address.verbatim-address: Stationsplein 45 A4.004, 3013 AK, Rotterdam, Netherlands

org-entry.content-note: promotes the exchange of information and experience in solid waste management, in order to protect human health and the environment
supports research and devt activities
provides advice
organizes confs and an annual World Congress (2023: Muscat, Oman, in Oct.-Nov.)
3 Regional Development Networks
publs Waste Management World , Waste Management and Research (monthly)
aims to study all questions relative to electricity applications, except commercial questions
links national groups and organizes international con­gresses on electricity applications every 4-5 years (18th Congress: Pilsen, Czech Rep., in Sept. 2021)
publ. Electricity for More Efficiency: Electric Technologies and their Energy Savings Potential

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Union for Vacuum Science, Technique and Applications (IUVSTA)

address.verbatim-address: c/o Dr Christoph Eisenmenger-Sittner, Vienna University of Technology, Wiedner Hauptstr. 8-10, 1040 Vienna, Austria

org-entry.content-note: collaborates with the International Standards Organization in defining and adopting technical standards
holds triennial Inter­national Vacuum Congress, European Vacuum Conference, triennial International Conference on Thin Films, and International Conference on Solid Surfaces
administers the Welch Foundation scholarship for postgraduate research in vacuum science and technology
publ. News Bulletins (2 a year, electronic version)

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Union of Laboratories and Experts in Construction Materials, Systems and Structures
org-entry-head.alt-name: Réunion Internationale des Laboratoires et Experts des Matériaux, systèmes de construction et ouvrages—RILEM

address.verbatim-address: 14-20 blvd Newton, Bãtiment Bienvenue, Cité Descartes, 77420 Champs-sur-Marne, Paris, France

org-entry.content-note: promotes the exchange of information and co-operation on experimental research concerning structures and materials
publs Materials and Structures (10 a year), RILEM Technical Letters , conf. proceedings

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: International Union of Scientific and Technical Associations and Organizations
org-entry-head.alt-name: Union internationale des associations et organismes techniques—UATI

address.verbatim-address: UNESCO House, 1 rue Miollis, 75732 Paris Cedex 15, France

org-entry.found-date: 1951 (fmrly Union of International Tech­nical Associations) under the auspices of UNESCO
org-entry.content-note: aims to promote and co-ordinate activities of mem. orgs and represent their interests
facilitates relations with international orgs, notably UN agencies
receives proposals and makes recommendations on the establishment of new international technical asscns

address.verbatim-address: 556 S. Fair Oaks Ave, Pasadena, CA 91105, USA

org-entry.content-note: aims to maintain universal standards on ethical and professional practices for all web professionals and to provide and foster professional advancement opportunities

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Latin American Association of Pharmaceutical Industries

address.verbatim-address: Avda Libertador 602, 6°, 1001 ABT Buenos Aires, Argentina

org-entry.stats: mems: about 400 enterprises in 14 Latin American countries

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: Regional Centre for Mapping of Resources for Development

address.verbatim-address: POB 632, 00618 Ruaraka, Nairobi, Kenya

org-entry.content-note: provides services for the professional techniques of map-making and the application of satellite and remote sensing data in resource analysis and devt planning
undertakes research and provides advisory services to African govts

org-entry-head.org-entry-name: World Association of Industrial and Technological Research Organizations (WAITRO)

address.verbatim-address:
c/o Jiangsu Industrial Technology Research Institute
, 7 Huafu Rd, Jiangbei New Area, 210031 Nanjing, People’s Republic of China

org-entry.content-note: promotes co-operation in industrial and technological research
provides financial assistance for training and jt activities
arranges international seminars
facilitates the exchange of information
publ. WAITRO News (quarterly)

address.verbatim-address: 25 Canada Sq., Level 35, Canary Wharf, London, E14 5LQ, United Kingdom

org-entry.content-note: aims to improve the safety and reliability of nuclear power plants through the exchange of information
in Sept. 2012 signed a Memorandum of Understanding with the IAEA to reflect enhanced co-operation in the aftermath of the March 2011 catastrophic nuclear accident at Fukushima Daiichi, Japan
operates 4 regional centres (in Paris, France; Tokyo, Japan; Moscow, Russian Fed.; and Atlanta, GA, USA) and a Co-ordinating Centre in the UK (which oversees a Peer Review Team based in Hong Kong)
following Russia’s invasion of Ukraine in Feb. 2022 WANO activated a Crisis Information Centre to provide updated details to mems of the safety status of Ukrainian nuclear facilities
org-entry.stats: mems: 120, operating more than 430 civil nuclear power reactors in 30 countries
org-entry.content-note: publs Highlights Report (annually), Performance Indicators (annually), WANO Review (annually)

address.verbatim-address: 31 Star St, Ware, Herts, SG12 7AA, United Kingdom

org-entry.content-note: produces statis­tics on production, consumption, stocks, prices and international trade in copper, lead, zinc, tin, nickel, aluminium and several other minor metals

address.verbatim-address: Maison de l'UNESCO, 1 rue Miollis, 75015 Paris, France

org-entry.content-note: aims to advance engineering as a profession
fosters co-operation between engineering orgs throughout the world
undertakes special projects in co-operation with other international bodies
hosts a World Engineers Convention (7th: Oct. 2023, in Prague, Czech Rep.)
org-entry.stats: mems: 90 nat. mems, 10 int. mems and 9 assoc. mems
org-entry.content-note: publ. WFEO Newsletter

address.verbatim-address: Winton House, Lyonshall, Kington, Herefordshire, HR5 3JP, United Kingdom

org-entry.found-date: 1927, as International Committee of Foundry Technical Asscns; name changed to World Foundrymen Org. in 2000, present name adopted in 2010
org-entry.content-note: organizes congress every 2 years (2024: Deyang, People’s Rep. of China, in Oct.)
publs Annual Foundry Nations Report , Congress proceedings, industry reports

address.verbatim-address: Tower House, 10 Southampton St, London, WC2E 7HA. United Kingdom

org-entry.found-date: 2001 to advance understanding of nuclear energy and formulate common industry positions
org-entry.content-note: organizes an annual World Nuclear Symposium (2022: London, in Sept.)
issues global trends reports and policy papers
org-entry.stats: mems: agencies and cos representing all areas of the nuclear fuel industry
